name: DarkFlow
description:
The ancient planet of Terra, once home of the human race is now uninhabitable, experiencing chaotic climatic conditions.

Your mission is to explore the rugged terrain in your highly agile flying saucer and seek out, retrieve or destroy precious anti-matter pods and other artefacts, using a tractor beam and plasma blaster.

You will encounter a variety of alien craft, some harmless, other deadly. You must also destroy the fiendish Dark Flow Drone before it pollutes the planet beyond repair.

DarkFlow features detailed 3D landscapes and realistic flight dynamics.

Please visit our development blog if you have any questions or feedback:

http://iphone-game-blog.blogspot.com/

We will also use the blog to announce new games.
